about_the_game:
Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout is a mix of several genres, with a carefully built narrative and art style. It is a charming RPG about friendship and courage in a dystopian context with varied mechanics and alternative endings.

A group of people is trapped in a high-tech facility on a tropical island in the year 2147. They must survive a malicious artificial intelligence system while fighting against dinosaurs and hacked robots.

Explore a vast island with distinct ecosystems and creatures. Mandatory grinding is not essential, but players can enjoy fast-paced strategic combat focused on character traits. You can solve conflicts with either HATE or LOVE strategies that influence the environment around you. Gameplay possibilities expand as you restore the facilities.

You play as a distinct group of characters that must overcome their differences to defeat a common enemy. You must administrate their skills to restore facilities before it is too late. Discover who is the malicious antagonist and escape its traps and puzzles to survive.

Features:

  • Main story: 40+ hours;
  • Main story + side quests: 50+ hours;
  • Completionist: 80+ hours;
  • Nostalgic atmosphere with an original plot.
  • Explore the secrets of a beautiful living 16-bit world.
  • A turn-based battle system with 7 unique playable characters.
  • Customize characters with an array of weapons and armor.
  • Different areas of the island present distinct ecologies.
  • Hundreds of different beasts for battle (including dinosaurs).
  • The game had scientist consultants to help build animals and flora accurately.
  • Expand gameplay functionalities as you restore each island complex.
  • Gradually updating gameplay with the fishing, crafting, capture, and taming systems.
  • Mission-focused story with great pacing and intense climaxes.
  • Explore an open world and play as you wish. Do you prefer developing a career as a hunter, a scavenger, or a conservationist?

Impact:
Part of the profits from the sales of DINO HAZARD is destined for scientific research in the field of paleontology, including the study of dinosaur fossils.

name: Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is meant to run on 60 Hz monitors. Running it on higher frequencies may cause unexpected issues.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)

reviews:
“Undertale, Jurassic Park, and Phantasy Star collide in a '90s-inspired time-traveling dinosaur JRPG made by actual paleontologists”
Games Radar

“Now you can have an experience among dinosaurs that looks quite nostalgic. If you love it, then this game is perfect for you.”
IGN

“A respectful RPG. Beautiful art. Amazing music. A nice thrilling story.”
Grinding Cast
short_description: Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout is a mix of several genres, with a carefully built narrative and art style. It is a charming RPG about friendship and courage in a dystopian context with varied mechanics and alternative endings.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Russian, Italian, Korean, Traditional Chinese
